overview: Two handsome janitors always seem to have naughty after hour escapades in the offices of the sexy women who work in the building. After exchanging their erotic stories of lascivious nights, the guys decide to change their routine and swap, further pleasing the clients they service. It will be a night of passion and lust as these janitors show their bosses how to work the late shift.
tagline: These Girls Love to Work Overtime
title: Love in the Bosses Office 2
